results.definition: the length of breadth of a finger used as a linear measure
feel or handle with the fingers
examples: finger the binding of the book

results.definition: any of the terminal members of the hand (sometimes excepting the thumb)
examples: her fingers were long and thin

results.definition: indicate the fingering for the playing of musical scores for keyboard instruments
one of the parts of a glove that provides covering for a finger or thumb

examples: I fingered my boss and found that he is not logged on in the afternoons
